name: repeatoire
publications: Todd J. Treangen, Aaron E. Darling, Guillaume Achaz, Mark A. Ragan, Xavier Messeguer, Eduardo P.C. Rocha, "A Novel Heuristic for Local Multiple Alignment of Interspersed DNA Repeats," IEEE/ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics, vol. 6, no. 2, pp. 180-189
description: Perform ab initio method to detect multiple repeats in genomes
